title: Stunning Mountain Escape at One of 2019’s Best Resorts - YIDU DUPLICATE
description: Having made the cut as one of the Best Resorts of the Year in Condé Nast Traveler China’s Gold List 2019, Alila Anji, Zhejiang boasts absolute luxury in the stunning, bamboo brimmed region of Anji - the location of the famous Oscar-winning movie ‘Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon’. Indulge in daily buffet breakfast, an unforgettable 3D six-course dining experience, Balinese couples’ massage and much more.

title: China Stunning Waterfront Huzhou Escape with Huge Outdoor Swimming Pool
description: Widely known for its longstanding tea culture, silk production and natural wonders, Huzhou is a sight to behold, yours to discover from Crowne Plaza Huzhou, an IHG Hotel. Treat yourself to mouthwatering cuisine at the signature Cai Feng Lou restaurant, where a wide selection of Huaiyang, Guangdong, Sichuan, Xiang and local dishes will delight your tastebuds. For tasty cocktails, head to the Lobby Lounge, or escape the heat with a leisurely dip in the oversized outdoor swimming pool.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Huzhou, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 1515 Xishan Road, Wuxing District, Huzhou 313000, China
